name: A New Fizzy Pop Match Mania App - Super Fun Game For Kids
name_original: A New Fizzy Pop Match Mania App - Super Fun Game For Kids
description: Jump into puzzle fun with this fizzy soda pop puzzle game.  Drag your finger to connect the same colored soda cans.  Try to get the biggest chain you can for maximum points.  Hurry up, Time is running out. Massively addicting.  It's free so grab it today.
